unnormalised: Lights, Camera, FESTIVAL! India's film festival scene is buzzing!
normalised: Lights, Camera, FESTIVAL! India's film festival scene is buzzing!

unnormalised: From the prestigious International Film Festival of India (IFFI) in Goa, which just wrapped up, to regional gems like the Kolkata International Film Festival, cinephiles are feasting on cinematic delights.
normalised: From the prestigious International Film Festival of India (I F F I) in Goa, which just wrapped up, to regional gems like the Kolkata International Film Festival, cinephiles are feasting on cinematic delights.

unnormalised: Speaking of feasting, rumor has it that some screenings even had biryani stalls - talk about a delicious double feature! This year, IFFI showcased a diverse range of films, including several promising debut features from Indian filmmakers.
normalised: Speaking of feasting, rumor has it that some screenings even had biryani stalls - talk about a delicious double feature! This year, I F F I showcased a diverse range of films, including several promising debut features from Indian filmmakers.

unnormalised: Independent films are finding wider audiences, thanks to these platforms. Remember that little gem, "Gully Boy"? It got its big break at a festival!
normalised: Independent films are finding wider audiences, thanks to these platforms. Remember that little gem, "Gully Boy"? It got its big break at a festival!

unnormalised: And let’s not forget the smaller, community-based festivals popping up in places like Kozhikode. They’re shining a spotlight on local talent.
normalised: And let’s not forget the smaller, community-based festivals popping up in places like Kozhikode. They’re shining a spotlight on local talent.

unnormalised: Plus, streaming services are scooping up festival darlings left and right, meaning you might catch that award-winning documentary from Mumbai right on your couch.
normalised: Plus, streaming services are scooping up festival darlings left and right, meaning you might catch that award-winning documentary from Mumbai right on your couch.

unnormalised: So keep your eyes peeled for upcoming festivals - you might just discover your next favorite film! It's like Onam – a cultural celebration but with popcorn instead of sadhya!
normalised: So keep your eyes peeled for upcoming festivals - you might just discover your next favorite film! It's like Onam – a cultural celebration but with popcorn instead of sadhya!
